Edison Pebojot Blog Project Podcast Research
Edison Pebojot

Edison Pebojot on a hike

Born: Dingalan, Aurora

Education: AMA Computer University (MIT - Master in Information Technology)

  • An IT/Software Professional from the Philippines who attended AMA Computer University, specializing in Computer engineering and Information Technology. They have a background in Mathematics and Physics, graduating as a top-three student from Science High School in Surigao Del Sur, Philippines. During their youth, they were involved in various community projects and youth camps, working towards the 17th Framework of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals by 2030.

    They developed software called Braindotnet during their freshman year at AMA Computer University, focusing on enhancing learning and knowledge assessment. The software enabled users to read topics, take quizzes, and monitor their progress. Later, they improved the software to encourage students to report their results via Really Simple Syndication.
